Text: to everyone who thanks me and stuff, i do notice it and appreciate it. however i dont live for praise, i do hope that everyone helps out seeding properly, if everyone seeds to a ratio of 20 like i do every day these shows should be available for free to old and new listeners for a veery long time.. sharing is caring, a better, more free world has to be made by laying down one brick after the other.  this is but a drop in the ocean, but at least its a drop.
